info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 9:59PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Warren, northeastern Saratoga and southern Washington Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 955 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Luzerne-Hadley, or 12 miles southwest of Lake George Village, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause poor drainage flooding. Locations impacted include... Glens Falls, Hudson Falls, Salem, Fort Edward, Corinth, West Glens Falls, Lake Luzerne Campground, Glens Falls North, Queensbury, Kingsbury, Porter, South Glens Falls, Lake Luzerne, Hadley, Argyle, Cossayuna, Beartown, Dunham Basin, Smiths Basin and Goose Island. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 17S and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized poor drainage flooding. Rainfall rates may reach an inch an hour.
